import React, { useRef,useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const EditDepartment = () => { const refcls=useRef(null) const updateData=()=>{ refcls.current.click() } const {id}=useParams(); const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ deptname:"", deptid:"", }) const [dept,setDept]=useState([]); const fetchDept=()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/editDept/${id}`) .then(async(result)=>{ let res=await result.json(); setDept(res); console.log(result) }) .catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) } useEffect(()=>{ fetchDept(); },[id]) setFormData({ }) const handelSubmit=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return ( <>
Edit Department
); }; export default EditDepartment;
